QuestData.Title: How to Train Your Direhorn
QuestData.Description:
I have to get some of whatever you fed your baby! Wow!
Now dat it's bigger, it is time to teach it to be a reliable battle companion.
Let's see how it does against a tougher challenge, hmm?
Talk to Kraal Master B'khor when you are ready to begin.
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk to Kraal Master B'khor and choose to train your direhorn.
